mapper.insert: insert into mbp_bucket(bucket_title, bucket_contents, open_yn, recommend_yn) values (#{bucketTitle}, #{bucketContents}, #{openYn}, #{recommendYn})
mapper.select: select tg.tag_id, tm.tag_name from mbp_tag tg join mbp_tagmanage tm on tg.tag_id = tm.tag_id where bucket_id = #{bucketId};
mapper.update: UPDATE mbp_bucket SET bucket_title = #{bu.bucketTitle}, bucket_contents = #{bu.bucketContents}, open_yn = #{bu.openYn}, recommend_yn = #{bu.recommendYn}, modify_date = current_date WHERE bucket_id = #{bucketId}
